"The Matter Board":
"The Matter Board is the system for advancing the story of Episodes 1-3.

The round-shaped nodes are called \"Matters\", and important gold-coloured nodes are called \"Key Matters\".

The story progresses as you complete objectives set by these \"Matters\"."

"The goals of some \"Matters\" involve defeating a specific type of enemy in a quest then collecting the target item.

The dropped items will be gold and shiny, so you can't miss them."

"Matter Boards come in two categories, Episodes 1+2 and Episode 3, and you can advance both of these separately.

You can switch which Episode you want to advance at any time."
"When a \"Matter\" which involves obtaining a target item is set as the \"Guided Matter\", \"Guide Markers\" will be displayed on target quests."
